name: Pikot: Stream Chat Games
storyline: Pikot is a game to interact the audience with the streamer, you have different type of minigames, for example remember food, or think and strategy to kill/help others and games like that.
summary: Pikot is a game that allows you to interact with your audience on Twitch chat in real time. Through minigames, you can grow your audience and solidify the foundations of a good community by challenging them through logical challenges, memory games and all kinds of games to combine with IRL sessions or simply play with your chat.
